sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, ListGroupItem, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/checkoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) //Calculate Prices cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0 ) cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100 cart.taxPrice = Number(0.15 * cart.itemsPrice) const placeOrderHandler = () => { console.log('order') } return (

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address},{cart.shippingAddress.city}, {cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cart.cartItems.length === 0 ? ( Your Cart is Empty... ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item, index) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x €{item.price} = €{item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summery

 Items €{cart.itemsPrice} Shipping €{cart.shippingPrice} Tax €{cart.taxPrice} Total €{cart.totalPrice}
) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
